MDPSimulator Class Reference

A SIMULATOR defined by a MDP. Used as a substitute for Guez's algorithms (cannot be used to actually simulate a MDP). More...

Detailed Description

A SIMULATOR defined by a MDP. Used as a substitute for Guez's algorithms (cannot be used to actually simulate a MDP).

Author
Castronovo Michael
Date
2014-10-11
